title: The Missing Signet Ring
description: A mystery in the village of Oakhaven.
introText:
You are a Royal Courier sent from the Capital to track down Lady Elara, who is suspected of ensuring the disappearance of the Royal Signet Ring.
Your pursuit has led you to the sleepy village of Oakhaven, where her trail has gone cold.
Find her, and retrieve the Ring at all costs.
tickMessage: The village bell tolls in the distance.

grove_path.description: The path to the Ancient Grove lies East from the Clearing. Known by the Ghost.

signet_ring.description: Silas is hiding the Royal Signet Ring under the counter. Known by Lady Elara.
